column1: #text=Before I left the house , I made sure I had my shopping list , my wallet , and my reusable shopping bags with me .
#text=I then walked to my local grocery store .
#text=When I entered the store , I picked up a shopping basket near the entrance .
#text=I then looked at my shopping list to see what I needed to buy .
#text=I walked through the aisles , selecting the items I had written on my shopping list and placing them in my shopping basket .
#text=When I had everything I needed , I lined up at the checkout .
#text=When it was my turn , I handed my shopping basket and my reusable shopping bags to the lady working at the checkout .
#text=She scanned my items , and another man placed all my items in my shopping bags .
#text=When everything had been scanned , the lady told me how much my groceries cost , and I handed her the correct amount of money .
#text=I then picked up my bags and left the store .
